      static class  rText.FontType
      rtext - Basic functions to load fonts and draw text CONFIGURATION: #define SUPPORT_MODULE_RTEXT rtext module is included in the build #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_FNT #define SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_TTF Selected desired fileformats to be supported for loading.
